resources.string:
This project consist of five screens. 
 1. Login screen 
 2. Welcome onboarding screen 
 3. Instructions onboarding screen 
 4. Shoe Listing screen 
 5. Shoe Detail screen for adding a new shoe 
 After Clicking on "View Shoe Listing" 
 ,it will display List of Shoes Available
 To Add new Shoe to the list 
 Click on Floating Button (Present at Bottom Right)
